document_data.name: Woodwisp Arrow
document_data.mainbody: '''''Woodwisp arrow''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that gave an [[arrow]] the ability to pass through wood.
document_data.Effects: The spell allowed the arrow to pass through wood as if it were moving through air. It only transformed the properties of the arrow, and did not allow the caster to see through wooden objects or [[tree]]s. The arrow had to be loosed from a bow within seconds of the spell's casting or the magic would expire and there was no effect.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required an arrow of ''masterwork'' quality.
